NATIONS,P:, 3683 A.COMMISSION ON AMENDMENTS TO THE COVENANT, Note by the Secretary-General,Geneva,March 19th, 1921.AH the members invited havo agreed to servo on this Commission, with the exception of -Sir Robert Bordon, who, greatly to his regret, finds it impracticable to accept.Whitehall Gardens, S.W. 31st.- March 1921.j
